geometri

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometri.AbstractForm
      • geometri.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometricalForm, java.lang.Comparable<GeometricalForm>

    public class Point
extends AbstractForm
    A class that represents a Point and have the ability to draw it on a JApplet or a JFrame.
    Author:
    Albin Bååw, Kristoffer Ek
